disclaimer: to execute a command use ! prefix
game <low> <high>:
start a guess number game you provide a boundary where bot generate number and you should find it.
Example !game 10 40
guess <number>:
guess the number if you right game ended and you win.
Example !guess 34
help: shows you all commands available to you
vote -q <question> -o <option>: This command provide you a vote ability
poll -q <question> -1 <option> -2 <optio: helps you create a poll with options
